# fn-args [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/fn-args.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/fn-args)

> Get the arguments of a function


## Install

```sh
$ npm install --save fn-args
```


## Usage

```js
var fn = function (foo, bar) {};

fnArgs(fn);
//=> ['foo', 'bar']
```
